attributes.action: Extend the course length of all A-Level subjects to a period of three years, rather than the current two
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to extend the study period of all A-Levels to a period of three years. This will still include the standard AS and A2 levels, they will just be studied over a longer period of time. This will relieve stress levels of the pupils, and give them more time to prepare for the crucial examinations.
